metadata.title: CVE-2024-26632 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: block:Fix iterating over an empty bio with bio_for_each_folio_all If the biocontains no data, bio_first_folio() calls page_folio() on a NULL pointerand oopses. Move the test that we've reached the end of the bio frombio_next_folio() to bio_first_folio(). [axboe: add unlikely() to errorcase]

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-7.7').
